text: Manmadha Sarangal is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Baby. ==Cast== * Uma Maheswari * Ravi Varma * Shabana * Jayarekha * Thodupuzha Vasanthy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Manmadha Sarangal
